name: atom-ide-datatip
description: A replacement for the Data Tooltip provider that was originally part of the Atom IDE package from Facebook.

datatipDebounceDelay.title: Delay before opening a datatip after moving on an identifier
datatipDebounceDelay.description: Delay (in ms) between hovering over an identifier and showing a datatip

datatipInteractedWithDebounceDelay.title: Delay before closing a datatip after moving away from an identifier once interacted with the datatip
datatipInteractedWithDebounceDelay.description: Delay (in ms) between hovering out of an identifier and hiding a datatip after you have interacted with it
